## Import libraries and data
```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggtern, plotly, tidyverse)

data <- read_csv('/Users/minghaooo/mtlmh34/ISSS608-VAA-mh/Data/respopagsex2000to2018_tidy.csv')

data
```
## Data wranggling
```{r}
agpop_mutated <- data %>%
  mutate(`Year` = as.character(Year))%>%
  spread(AG, Population) %>%
  mutate(YOUNG = rowSums(.[4:8]))%>%
  mutate(ACTIVE = rowSums(.[9:16]))  %>%
  mutate(OLD = rowSums(.[17:21])) %>%
  mutate(TOTAL = rowSums(.[22:24])) %>%
  filter(Year == 2018)%>%
  filter(TOTAL > 0)
agpop_mutated
```

## Ternary Diagram
```{r}
ggtern(data=agpop_mutated,aes(x=YOUNG,y=ACTIVE, z=OLD)) + geom_point()
```
### Added Theme
```{r}
ggtern(data=agpop_mutated, aes(x=YOUNG,y=ACTIVE, z=OLD)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title="Population structure, 2015") +
  theme_rgbw()
```

### Interactive
```{r}
label <- function(txt) {
  list(
    text = txt, 
    x = 0.1, y = 1,
    ax = 0, ay = 0,
    xref = "paper", yref = "paper", 
    align = "center",
    font = list(family = "serif", size = 15, color = "white"),
    bgcolor = "#b3b3b3", bordercolor = "black", borderwidth = 2
  )
}

axis <- function(txt) {
  list(
    title = txt, tickformat = ".0%", tickfont = list(size = 10)
  )
}

ternaryAxes <- list(
  aaxis = axis("Young"), 
  baxis = axis("Active"), 
  caxis = axis("Old")
)

plot_ly(
  agpop_mutated,
  # a b c are the 3 variables, text is the tooltip (sub-zone)
  a = ~YOUNG, 
  b = ~ACTIVE, 
  c = ~OLD, 
  text = ~SZ,
  color = I('#DB7365'), 
  type = "scatterternary"
) %>%
  layout(
    annotations = label("Ternary Markers"), 
    ternary = ternaryAxes
  )
```
